    • Method Detail

      • makeSocialClass

        public static EditableSocialClass makeSocialClass(java.lang.String name,
                                                  double size,
                                                  double participationRatio)
        Create a populated EditableSocialClass entity and also create its salesStock, moneyStock and consumptionStock
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the social Class
        size - the size(population) of this social class
        participationRatio - the proportion of this class that sells labour power
        Returns:
        the populated EditableSocialClass

      • editableSocialClasses

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<EditableSocialClass> editableSocialClasses(int projectID)
        Create an observable list of EditableSocialClass entities (normally for display in the SocialClass Table) from the project identified by the current projectID and timeStamp.
        Parameters:
        projectID - the ID of the project containing the social classes whose observable representation is to be constructed
        Returns:
        an observableList of EditableSocialClass entities identified by projectID and its current timeStampID

        Parameters:

        d - the value to be placed in the field

      • makeStockColumn

        public static javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<EditableSocialClass,java.lang.Double> makeStockColumn(java.lang.String commodityName)
        Create a column dynamically, ready to be added to the socialClasses table, which refers to a stock owned by the social Class entity that owns this stock.
        Parameters:
        commodityName - the name of the commodity to which this refers
        Returns:
        an editable TableColumn entity that will display this stock, and allow it to be edited.
